title: Bitcoin just printed a $20K monthly candle — its biggest ever in USD
description:
BTC price returns are already hitting records with Bitcoin eyeing an attack on all-time highs after preserving $60,000.

Bitcoin (BTC) is still short of all-time highs after its incredible February gains, but bulls have already set a new record.

In a post on X (formerly Twitter) on Mar. 1, Checkmate, the pseudonymous lead on-chain analyst at Glassnode, revealed a “remarkable” BTC price event.

The Feb. 29 monthly close sealed a clear win for Bitcoin bulls.

Read more

title: Terraform Labs Founder Do Kwon Faces Extradition Delay in Montenegro Amid SEC Fraud Allegations
description: Do Kwon, the embattled former CEO of Terraform Labs, is currently stranded in Montenegro due to extradition delays, following accusations by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) of conducting a massive fraudulent crypto scheme. Last year, the SEC charged that from April 2018 to May 2022, Terraform and Kwon’s operations resulted in at least […]

title: Bitcoin mining stocks experience significant decline despite Bitcoin rally
description: In a surprising turn of events, Bitcoin mining stocks have witnessed a substantial downturn, plummeting by as much as 27% over the last three trading days. This decline comes despite a recent surge in Bitcoin’s value, with the cryptocurrency nearly touching the $64,000 mark.  Analysts attribute this downward trend to a combination of factors, including […]

title: Empowering Artists in the Virtual Economy: A New Model
description: The advent of the digital age has ushered in a new era for art, transforming how art is created and how it is shared, experienced, and acquired. Digital technology has democratized art distribution, enabling artists to reach global audiences without the limitations of physical gallery space or geographic boundaries.  This paradigm shift has led to […]

title: SEC Initiates Sweeps and Investigations into AI Use
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has intensified its focus on utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) in the financial sector. In response to significant technological advancements, the SEC has launched sweeping examinations targeting investment advisers’ AI models and confirmed ongoing AI-related investigations within its Division of Enforcement. Under the leadership of SEC Chairman Gensler, concerns […]

title: Unveiling the Surprising Influence of Positive Thinking on AI Chatbot Performance
description: Recent research sheds light on an intriguing aspect of artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots: their response to prompts infused with positive thinking. A study conducted by engineers at VMware in California unveiled how subtle modifications in prompts, including a Star Trek-themed approach, remarkably improved the performance of AI chatbots in solving grade-school-level math problems. Published on […]

title: Blast mainnet goes live, unlocking $2.3b in crypto
description: The layer-2 project Blast has announced the launch of its mainnet. Blast has announced in an X post on March 1 that it will airdrop tokens after the launch of its mainnet. According to the post, half will be distributed…

title: Kelexo presale being considered by Cardano and Solana holders
description: The Kelexo (KLXO) presale is attracting interest from Cardano (ADA) and Solana (SOL) holders seeking new growth opportunities
